doc:
Roy Rolland https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roy_Rolland 0 Roy Rolland (29 June 1921–16 August 1997) was an English comedian and stage actor who was the understudy for Arthur Lucan as Old Mother Riley and who took over the role following the death of Lucan in 1954, playing it until about 1977. Roy_Rolland ( 29_June_1921 – 16_August_1997 ) was an_English_comedian_and_stage_actor who was the_understudy for Arthur_Lucan as Old_Mother_Riley and who took over the_role following the_death of Lucan in 1954 , playing it until about 1977 .
